reviewText: Excellent series with in-depth first person interviews. Highly Recommended!!!!!
didn't work in either of the 3 DVD devices in the house
The movie doesn't show any footage of the Legion. It only interviews some old ex-legionnaires. Only films of re-enactors. Voice track is way out of sync.

It is a pretty well done documentary and gives a good historical perspective of the Legion.  You will not find any footage or information from Vietnam era till present.  It concentrates on the early and middle history of the Legion.
